data.eml:eml: A new Neotropical genus of Blastini (Psocodea: ' Psocoptera': Psocidae: Amphigerontiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article García Aldrete, Alfonso N., Román-P, Cristian (2015): A new Neotropical genus of Blastini (Psocodea: ' Psocoptera': Psocidae: Amphigerontiinae). Zootaxa 4000 (3): 392-396, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4000.3.6
